comments: a(n) is the number of ordered pairs of lattice points (vectors in R^2 with integer coordinates) that are in or on a square centered at the origin with side length 2*n. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Apr 20 2013
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
example: a(1) = 81 because there are 9 lattice points in or on the 2 x 2 square centered at the origin, so there are 9*9 =81 ordered pairs. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Apr 20 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
